Detailed Description

Arguments for Fvid2_create().

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncCreateParams::clkEdge

Specifies the clock edge to be used to latch data on. FALSE spacifies to latch on falling edge, raising edge otherwise.

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncCreateParams::deviceI2cAddr

I2C device address for each device

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncCreateParams::deviceI2cInstId

I2C device instance ID to use.

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncCreateParams::hotPlugGpioIntrLine

Hot plug GPIO interrupt line no - if supported by encoder.

UInt32 Bsp_VidEncCreateParams::inpClk

input clock.
